item.title: Robson Jorge and Lincoln Olivetti - Robson Jorge and Lincoln Olivetti
item.description: Información del álbum facilitada por discogs.com: Fecha de lanzamiento: 1982 Géneros: Electronic, Jazz, Latin, Funk / Soul Estilos: Boogie, Funk, Fusion Pais: Finland Votos: Media de 3.17 con 6 votos Sello: EMI Copyright (c): Oy EMI Finland Ab Phonographic Copyright (p): Oy EMI Finland Ab Published By: Love Kustannus Oy Published By: Imudico Recorded At: Finnvox Mixed At: Finnvox Printed By: Uudenmaan Ammattipaino Ky Arranged By - Yari Backing Vocals - Arja Häyhä
